A particle moves along a curve with position vector given by r(t) = (t + 2 , 1 − t , t 2/2 ) for −∞ < t < ∞. (a) Find the velocity as a function of t. (b) Find the speed as a function of t. (c) Find the acceleration as a function of t. (d) Find the curvature as a function of t. (f) Find an equation for the osculating plane at the point corresponding to t = 0. (g) Find the centre of the osculating circle at the point corresponding to t = 0. 8.
